pages.text: A mutated beast which lurks beneath the $(c)Deep Frozen Ocean$() waves. She is extremely aggressive, and will $(#00a800)even break the ice to get at you$() when you are on land. Be very wary. You will most likely need to $(6)fight back$(), slaying her temporary form before she can reappear.
Turgid black skin studded with crystals adorns this creature.
pages.name: Mother of the Maze
